issue.title: [CF 1278] Reverse bar direction
issue.body:
Excuse me if I have just missed something but I have been scouring the options menu and I can't seem to see any way of reversing the bar directions for my icons. I have been able to mirror everything (the icon position, the text positioning etc) other than the way in which the bar moves. I see the 'fill bar up' option but what I am looking for is an option to simply have the bar decay from left to right, opposite to the default way it decays.

I believe this would be a simple addition if it's not already implemented. If it's already implemented would you be able to point me in the right direction? Thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user sk3ng | Imported from CurseForge issue #1278 | Raw

comments.body:
For instance, Could you make it so the bar direction is affected by the 'flip icon' option? With the icon on the left it decays right to left and with the icon on the right, it decays left to right?
